Description:
Potential Plus In Fantastic Dandenong Location!
Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to purchase this renovated and spacious home with a large and secure backyard!
Greeted by a porch upon entrance, this semi-detached brick veneer home is set in an ideal location with convenience at your fingertips. Boasting three spacious bedrooms, this beautiful home features a renovated bathroom with a large shower. At the front of the home, the sizeable lounge room is warm and welcoming making you feel right at home, with polished hardwood flooring and gas ducted heating throughout. This unique home has traditional character features which include: high ceilings, solid timber skirtings and timber window frames, decorative cornices and picture rails. The kitchen has been updated and offers an upright cooker. There is also potential to extend the home into the deep, secure backyard. Added bonuses outside include: two colour bond sheds and fruit trees.
Key features include: possibility to extend house into the backyard, Dandenong's strong future growth and increasing demand in the area, Capital Growth, Fully updated / renovated home, Large backyard, New Hot water Service, Ducted Heating. Other great features include: off street parking and no body corporate fees.
In an exceptionally convenient location, close to schools, EastLink, bike tracks, Dandenong Plaza, good schools and train stations this is an opportunity not to be missed. Give Zed a call now to avoid disappointment!
Insights: 2/83 Jones Road, Dandenong VIC 3175 was last sold in 2017 and 123 other 3 bedroom house in Dandenong have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious Family Living in Lovely Neighbourhood
The Feel:
Popular with families due to its great position central to schools & Curlewis Shopping Centre, this location is also close to green reserves & a short drive to beaches. Designed to accommodate the evolving needs of family life, this 4-bed, 2-bath home also offers 2 spacious living areas, & seamless access to the covered east-facing deck for outdoor entertaining. A well-equipped kitchen & meals area forms the central hub for a large family who will love the advantages of living in this friendly neighbourhood.
The Facts:
-Exceptional family home with generous proportions & stylish finishes
-Cleverly designed floorplan designed to maximise space while providing separate relaxation zones
-First impressions of neat exterior finish with well-kept garden & timber portico entrance
-Welcoming entry reveals freshly painted interior surfaces & beautiful bamboo flooring
-3.3m ceiling height to light, bright OP kitchen/family/meals, with high light windows to east aspect
-Stylish kitchen features servery bench, walk-in pantry & pendant lighting
-Quality s/s apps; 900mm Technika f/s electric oven, 5 burner gas hob, Bosch DW
-Free flow via stacker doors to expansive deck & entertaining area w/ café blinds
-2nd living offers relaxed lounge/theatre, or versatile games room/rumpus
-Direct access to low maintenance backyard & rear merbau deck
-4 well-appointed bedrooms (or 3BRs with study) easily accommodates growing family
-North facing Master with tinted privacy windows, en-suite & walk-in robe
-Main family bathroom with deep bath & shower, plus separate WC
-Ducted heating & refrigerated cooling, RC ceiling fans in all bedrooms and 2 living areas
-Laundry with ample room & cupboard space + linen press in hallway
-Efficient features: part tinted windows, 2kw solar panels, gas boosted solar hot water
-Zosi remote access 4xcamera security system, video intercom
-RC DLUG & side gate access via double gate provides access to utilities + 3x1.2m shed
The Owner Loves.
We love how this house is all in one.. there are places to enjoy a little pocket of peace, whether that be in zoned bedrooms or 2 distinctive outdoor areas. Our favourite part of the house is the main family living area, stepping straight out onto the huge deck which enjoys absolute privacy. Its a warm & inviting neighbourhood, full of families.

Description:
Land for Sale : 7 BALBOA GROVE CURLEWIS VIC 3222
Phone enquiries - please quote property ID 21150
Dont miss out a fantastic opportunity to buy a titled residential block of land on the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula. The block is situated in the Bayview estate in Curlewis. It is a 400 sqm, level block. The Bayview estate has very few limitations in regards to designs and building timeframe. The block has fantastic views over Corio Bay as wellas over the creek and parklands with walking trails and bikepaths. This block is within walkingdistance form the local primaryschool, shoppingcenter and medical center as well as the beach and harbor of Clifton Springs. This block on 7 BALBOA GROVE CURLEWIS VIC 3222 is not designated bushfire prone Area you will save on that.
Area is 400m2
width 12.50m
Depth 32m
Thanks.

Description:
Build Your Home in a Dream Location
Want to live across from lush parklands & be able to walk to the bay? Perfectly positioned this 350m2 block of land in the highly desired Bayview Estate Curlewis will tick your boxes. Here is your chance to build your modern dream home on the Bellarine Peninsula & live the lifestyle of envy including bays, beaches & wineries all at your doorstop. Just 17kms from Geelong CBD and within 12kms to Portarlington which features the Ferry Service across to Melbourne. Plus all the local schools, shops, cafes, supermarkets & medical facilities. The Bellarine rail trail is also here for all cycling & walking adventures with the Clifton Springs boat ramp just a short distance down the road. With generous government incentives, there has never been a better time to build than right now such as a bonus $25,000 for HomeBuilder scheme or $45,000 for first home buyers!* Conditions Apply

Description:
BLISSFUL LUXURY ABODE
This beautiful architecturally designed and unique custom home has been built with exquisite attention to detail and enjoys a relaxed luxurious ambiance that invites you to stop, take a breath and just take in the space and tranquility of this blissful position! Featuring a reversed living design with upstairs enjoying a designer kitchen with butlers pantry and spacious open plan dining & living space flowing out to an entertainers balcony with stunning bay views captured from not only the balcony but master and living. Upstairs further enjoys a beautiful master bedroom with full sized ensuite, second bedroom with BIR, full central bathroom and laundry whilst Downstairs features a formal lounge at the entrance of the home, 2 further bedrooms and third bathroom. Automobile enthusiasts will be impressed by the four car garage resembling a luxury car showroom featuring a reinforced slab provision for a hoist, spotless epoxy coated concrete flooring and glass doors leading through to a wet bar and out to the rear garden through bi fold glass doors.
Further features of the home include a Rinnai gas flame fireplace, ducted heating, split system and provisions installed for an internal lift should it be required in the future. Enjoy low maintenance living with fully landscaped gardens allowing more time to explore the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula with access to all wineries including Jack Rabbit, Laura Park Estate and much more. A short stroll gets you to both the waterfront reserve and Curlewis shopping centre - so park the car and relax - This magnificent home truly has something for everyone!

Description:
Titled Land in Exclusive Coastal Estate!
The Feel:
If building a brand new coastal residence with fantastic home business suitability and exposure has been on your wish list, then consider this already titled block in the exclusive Bayview Estate, and get moving on it now!
Design and build a modern dream home just moments from Curlewis best amenities, with the convenience of Clifton Springs Primary, Bayview Central shopping centre and the beach all right on your doorstep.
The Facts:
-Bonus $25,000 for HomeBuilder scheme or $45,000 for first home buyers!* Conditions Apply
-512sqm approx. land parcel in the beautifully planned Bayview Estate
-Rare titled land ready to build upon, at last years prices!
-16m street frontage and 32m block depth ideal for a large family home (STCA)
-Neighbouring allotment also available, ideal for expansive home/ shedding/ business
-Potential for elevated north facing living to enjoy views out to the bay (STCA)
-Surrounded by modern builds, childrens playgrounds and green spaces
-Well planned walkways lead through natural setting down to the beach
-Central Bellarine location for exploring local wineries and coastal towns
-Safe walk to Clifton Springs Primary School via Griggs Creek Bridge
-Easy access to Bayview Central for shopping, cafes and health services
-Bus services nearby for local colleges and access into Geelong CBD

Description:
Beautiful Bayside Entertainer!
The Feel:
Commanding attention within a covetable bayside estate, this two storey 4BR home is completely ready for you to enjoy the best of the Bellarine. Offering glimpses across the bay and You Yangs, surrounded by grassy open space, this family property offers ease of lifestyle with all the comforts and luxuries of a modern retreat.
The Facts:
-Private retreat and living space to the lower level
-Upstairs OP living, kitchen and dining with balcony access
-Stone benchtops, 900mm gas cooktop/oven and WIP
-Bay glimpses and calming outlooks across the You Yangs
-Undercover alfresco deck, flowing onto flat grassy yard
-3 BRs enjoy private placement, sharing the main bath
-Upstairs master suite with ensuite, WIR and private balcony
-Separate powder room for guest convenience upstairs
-Low maintenance brick/rendered facade, DLUG with int. entry
-Ideal placement for all water sports and nature lovers
-Enjoy close proximity to award winning restaurants and wineries
-Schools, public transport and practical facilities all close by
-A beautiful place to call home or bayside holiday retreat
The Owner Loves.
The ample outdoor space is perfect for entertaining all year round, with plenty of grass perfect for pets and families. The reverse living layout maximizes the stunning views of the bay all year round and the location is central to everything you need in a quiet well established street.

Description:
Brand new build in Curlewis with stunning upgrades!
This brand new build in Curlewis boasts chic style with stunning upgrades throughout the entire home. Fantastically located with Bayview Central shopping mall 100m from your doorstep offering a lifestyle of convenience. The open plan living, dining & kitchen keeps all the action in one place. Abundant natural light, high ceilings & sliding doors opening up to the outdoor alfresco creates a desirably spacious indoor-outdoor entertaining area or family hub. With contemporary features around every corner it's resort living combined with comfort & character!
Kitchen- 20mm caesarstone benchtops, double undermount sink, matte black tapware, pendant lights overhanging island bench, feature subway tile splashback, 900mm Westinghouse freestanding oven, retractable rangehood, pot drawers, dishwasher, overhead cabinetry, walk in pantry
Living- open plan living, dining & kitchen, timber laminate flooring, downlights, natural light, split system air conditioner, ducted heating, roller blinds, glass sliding doors open from main living to outdoor alfresco
Master bedroom- carpeted, roller blinds, ceiling fan, downlights, ducted heating, walk in robe, ensuite with single vanity, 20mm caesarstone benchtop, double semi frameless shower with subway feature tiling, dual shower heads & niche, matte black tapware, personal toilet
Additional two bedrooms- carpeted, ceiling fans, downlights, ducted heating, roller blinds, mirrored built in sliding robes
Main bathroom- single vanity, 20mm caesarstone benchtop, feature subway tile splashback, long bath, matte black tapware, single semi frameless shower, separate toilet
Outdoor- undercover cement alfresco with ceiling lights, low maintenance backyard, gravel pathway
Mod cons- laundry with extended bench & trough, double lock up garage with internal access, high ceilings (2340mm high) & Hampton's profiled doors throughout, square set cornices to entire living region & hallways, façade displays brick pillar lights, ceiling fans in all three bedrooms, ducted heating throughout home & split system air conditioner in main living/dining/kitchen for year round comfort
Ideal for: First Home Buyers, couples, downsizers, investors, retirees
Close by local facilities: Bayview Central Curlewis with Woolworths, BWS, Pharmacy & local cafes, Clifton Springs Primary School, Clifton Springs Tennis Club, local parks

Description:
Opportunity Waits For Nobody!
The Feel:
Situated in the prestigious Baywater Estate just a few blocks from the foreshore, this already titled allotment has fantastic potential for iconic water views across Corio Bay and the You Yangs(STCA). Settle into one of the friendliest neighbourhoods surrounded by stunning coastal homes, where daily walks to the beach along pristine walking tracks becomes the norm and let lifestyle come first!
The Facts:
-Bonus $25,000 for HomeBuilder scheme or $45,000 for first home buyers!* Conditions Apply
-500sqm (approx) north facing allotment in prestigious Baywater Estate
-Elevated allotment captures iconic views across the bay towards the You Yangs
-Design and build a double storey home, with water views from ground level (STCA)

-Easy access to Geelong, and 90mins to Docklands via the Portarlington Ferry

Overlooking the Bellarine Rail Trail for the energetic ones and just minutes to the Clifton Springs Boat Ramp for the fishing or boating enthusiasts. Buyers looking to escape city life and venture out to the wonderful Bellarine Peninsula where life is lived at a relaxed pace will be impressed by the value for money of this parcel of land. First home buyers take advantage of the current Government incentives. This allotment is situated within the Coriyule Estate in Curlewis, one of the Bellarines fasting growing suburbs. No restrictive Design Guidelines. Call for more informmation.

Description:
Expansive Family Dream Home
The Feel:
The versatile floorplan of this expansive home will make you rethink the way you live & work. Opportunities to operate a home business, accommodate extended family, or afford your children/guests space of their own, are just some of the exciting possibilities presented by this remarkable Hampton's inspired home. Premium finishes & inclusions evoke effortless elegance, while features like a breathtaking kitchen, sumptuous master wing & 4 more spacious bedrooms (2 with en-suites) are glamour personified.
The Facts:
-Near new Hampton's inspired abode built by Boutique Homes, 47 squares with 9-foot ceilings
-5 luxuriously large, well-appointed bedrooms, 3 with en-suites & walk-in robes
-Sunny north east aspect maximises indoor/outdoor living
-9m alfresco undercover area accessed by dual sets of triple stacker sliding doors
-Central activity hub with French Oak veneer floors combines kitchen/living/dining areas
-Show-stopping kitchen with trio of glass pendant lights & premium 60mm Caesarstone benchtops
-Light-filled windows as splash backs & spectacular island boasting extra wide sink
-Hampton's style cabinetry offers abundant storage; extra-long soft closing drawers & imported handles
-S/s European Ilve appliances; 2 electric ovens (900mm & 600mm), microwave, 6-burner gas hob
-Commodious butler's pantry with fridge cavity, WIP, Fisher & Paykel dbl drawer DW & extra large sink
-Internal access from garage to pantry through glass doors for easy unpacking of groceries
-Downstairs is master bedroom number 3 with double glass door entrance, WIR & stylish en-suite
-Convenient powder room alongside large laundry (extra cupboards & large walk-in linen)
-Zoned open plan living area makes the perfect entertainment zone
-Family room with Jetmaster log fireplace for cosy nights in & big screen tv niche
-Second living area offers versatility for formal dining, entertainment or games room
-Triple stacker sliding doors to 9m (approx.) undercover alfresco area
-Stained Victorian Ash hardwood extra wide steps take you to another living area upstairs
-Ultra-private upper level family sanctum with 4 bedrooms featuring en suites & walk-in robes
-Main master bedroom/parents retreat (8.5m long) incorporates a sitting room to read & relax
-Luxe en-suite with twin vanities, wall to wall cabinetry, deep f/s bath, walk-in shower & concealed WC
-Huge custom-built WIR with hanging spaces, drawers & shelving
-Master bedroom number 2 offers elevated street views, WIR & a full en-suite
-Beds 4 & 5 both have BIRs, serviced by a chic central bathroom with bath & shower
-State of the art Daikin refrigerated cooling & heating with 4 zones
-Integrated tech: Dorani intercom system, Swann CCTV system
-Additional features inc: ample linen/cupboard space,40mm stone benchtops & glass doors throughout, double glazed windows, RC plantation shutters on staircase, Opticomm underground cabling for internet & tv connectivity, DLUG, low maintenance landscaped front garden, exposed aggregate driveway/paths
-Stunning coastal home 400m walk down to the bay & cliff top walks
The Owner Loves.
we absolutely love coming back home after a clifftop walk along the bay to a beautiful space that works so well for entertaining as well as giving us ample space for quiet times.
We are so lucky to have had our own resort-style home so close to the beach!

Description:
Spacious, Sunny and Great Location
This four bedroom home is designed to cater for a contemporary lifestyle where spacious and sunny indoor and outdoor living is essential. It has a floor plan to suit families or anyone who loves to host guests.
A few of the features here include a generous master suite with en-suite and walk-in robe. The open plan living zone is the focal point of the home and it features a well-planned kitchen with an oversize walk in pantry, quality appliances and a breakfast bar, which all makes it easy to entertain the crowds. The adjacent family and meals area both enjoy effortless access to outdoor living. Choose from a covered north facing patio or west facing hardwood deck complete with ceiling fan and cafe blinds. A second living area is ideal as a media room or as a parents quiet retreat.
Three additional bedrooms have built in robes and share a family sized bathroom with separate bath and shower. A laundry with ample storage; and a double lock up garage with roll through access to the rear are also included. The superbly landscaped 512m² (approx) allotment is fenced and easy care and comes with a handy garden shed.
Located in a peaceful pocket, this property is ideally placed for quick access to shops and the local primary school. Harbourside boating and fishing as well as ocean beaches are nearby, as are the nature filled reserves and world class wineries that the Bellarine is famous for. Impressively maintained, this is a smart solution for modern living.

Description:
Neat as a Pin Package
Light & bright just 12 months young this contemporary 4 bedroom Simmonds home offers direct access to the popular Bellarine rail trail. Master bedroom has street views, walk in robe & full en-suite. First living is perfect as a parents retreat or formal lounge with yard views. Flowing on is the family hub with an open plan kitchen & dining zone, double cupboard pantry, stainless steel appliances that include a 900mm electronic oven & gas 5 burner cook top with range hood plus dishwasher. Tiled dining has sliding doors out to the patio area making entertaining a breeze. 2nd spacious family living also has sliding doors out to the backyard. Bedrooms 2, 3 & 4 all have built in robes off a divided hallway for privacy. Also here is a central bathroom with a deep bath & separate shower. Double linen off the laundry. Additional features are gas ducted heating, reverse cycle split system, solar hot water, led down lights plus a double lock up garage with internal access. Lovely low maintenance gardens on a 448m2 block giving enough room for kids & pets to play. Don't build - the hard work has been done so all you have to do is just purchase, pack then move & enjoy the Bellarine lifestyle today. An absolute must on your house hunting list.

Description:
Lifestyle of Envy
Tribeca built two storey 4 bedroom family home offers you the pinnacle of low maintenance living without compromising on quality just 3 years young. Lovely low maintenance gardens lead you to the front door as you enter inside to the first lounge area which is light filled with street views. Down the hall is the vast open planning living zone perfect as the family hub with a dining area and a 2nd living area both with sliding doors out to the undercover patio making entertaining a breeze. Modern kitchen features stone benches, a plethora of cupboards, huge walk in pantry with stainless steel appliances including a gas 5 burner cook top, 900mm oven, range hood and dish washer. Also on the ground floor is a powder room, a giant laundry solving more storage needs with a walk in linen. You also have internal access from the double lock up garage. Take the stairs up to the second storey where everyone can sleep tight on the same level, no segregation worries here with the kids downstairs. Master bedroom will be sure to impress you as it is super-sized with its own built in parents retreat & private balcony with ever changing bay views. Also here is a walk in robe, a large ensuite that has his & hers vanities, double sized shower and hidden toilet. Bedroom 2 is bigger likewise with bay views which could be used as a 3rd living or study with built in robes. Bedrooms 3 & 4 are identical twins, same size with built in robes. Central stylish bathroom services this area with a separate powder room. Additional features include neutral tones throughout for a calm & coastal vibe, LED down lights, gas ducted heating, reverse cycle split system, solar hot water service, off street parking, side gates & all on a fantastic block size of 508m2. Surrounded by an array of premium homes this amazing residence is only a stroll to the shops or the bay. Just a short drive to everything the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer such as the rail trail, boat ramps, beaches, ferry services, cafes, wineries, golf clubs, parks, playgrounds, schools and more, you will love where you live!

Your brand-new home awaits, just moments from Curlewis best amenities! Presenting an easy-care 3-bed residence, this home is perfect for first home buyers taking advantage of generous government incentives or any investors/downsizers looking for their next savvy purchase. North orientation invites loads of natural light into the open plan living, dining & kitchen, with direct access to a private backyard. Enjoy the convenience of being located less than a minute from the new Curlewis Shopping Centre, with the local Primary School & parks also nearby.
The Facts:
-Brand new 3BR home set in the desirable Bayview Estate
-100m to Bayview Central, 600m to Clifton Springs Primary School
-10 min walk to stunning bayside beaches via Griggs Creek trail
-Undercover front patio with a welcoming & private entry
-S/S Westinghouse 900mm electric oven, gas cooktop & rangehood + walk-in pantry
-OP living & social dining space enjoy abundant natural light due to northern aspect
-Affordable first home/downsize option or portfolio addition
-Master BR at façade with WIR & modern en suite with shower
-Family bathroom with deep inset bathtub, shower, vanity & separate WC
-Low maintenance floating floorboards to high traffic areas, carpet to bedrooms
-SLUG with internal & rear utility access
-Ducted heating & ceiling fans
-Landscaped areas ready for gardens to complete the outdoor spaces
-Quick access to existing Marketplace Shops & Bayview Central
-Established family friendly estate. 5 to Drysdale CBD, 25 to Geelong
The Owner Loves.
Its a really central position in the estate, close to parks and playgrounds, with the convenience of the new Curlewis Shopping Centre across the road.

Description:
Plenty Of Space For The Growing Family
Presenting spacious family living in a peaceful pocket of Curlewis, youll need to act swiftly to secure this carefree lifestyle.
With the Morris Street playground footsteps from your front door, you wont have to venture far to enjoy some outdoor family fun. Public transport is also within walking distance, along with the Bay View Shopping Centre and Drysdale Recreation Reserve. Clifton Springs P.S. is moments away, while both Bellarine Secondary College and St Ignatius College are within close reach. Enjoy easy access to the Clifton Springs boat ramp, Curlewis Golf Club and the regions finest wineries.
Zoned to the front of the home, the lounge creates a generous spot to pop up your feet and unwind. With the spacious open plan living/dining/kitchen zone flowing onto the sheltered alfresco, youll never have to worry about running out of room again. The kitchen will impress with stone benchtops, a walk-in pantry, and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas cooktop and rangehood). The impressive island bench conveniently doubles as a breakfast bar for casual dining.
The Master Bedroom provides a quiet retreat for parents with a walk-in robe and en suite with large shower. Three additional bedrooms with mirrored built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, along with the main bathroom and separate toilet. The laundry boasts storage and external access, while an abundance of storage is featured throughout the home. Youll be in comfort all year long thanks to ducted heating and a split-system air conditioner. Easy care gardens line the secure backyard, which wraps around the northern side of the home. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, plus a rear roller door that provides backyard vehicle access perfect for storing caravans, boats, or trailers.

Description:
Stylish & Practical Family Living
Earthy, neutral tones set the scene for this near new, neat as a pin home. Cleverly zoned with practical family living in mind and set upon a 466m2 parcel, this is a sure stand out.
Upon entry you're welcomed by a separate lounge, with the central hallway leading through to the master bedroom with walk-in-robe and fully equipped ensuite. The heart of the home lends itself in the way of a spacious kitchen with stone benchtops, walk-in-pantry, 900ml gas cooking and dishwasher, while overlooking the dining and 2nd open living. A separate wing of the home hosts the remaining 2 bedrooms with built-in-robes, family bathroom with tiled in tub, shower and vanity and laundry with outdoor access.
Outdoor entertaining is made effortless with sliding doors from the dining area, out to the expansive undercover pergola and spacious back garden.
Additional features include - Ducted heating, 2 split systems, DLUG with internal and external access
Located on the doorstep to the Curlewis Shopping Centre, schools, public transport, and the Bay, with the Bellarine's world class wineries, eateries, beaches and Golf Courses at your fingertips. This booming suburb is at the top of everyone's list - secure your slice today.

Description:
Vacant Land In Desirable Location
The Feel:
An outstanding opportunity presents for those looking to purchase in a newly established, family-friendly pocket with convenient proximity to the shops, schools & nearby beaches. Bring your dream home to life on one of the last remaining vacant elevated allotments in this highly sought-after position, with access to landscaped walking paths within the Estate. Snap up this rare 575m2 (approx.) site to secure your lifestyle property or investment.
The Facts:
-Bonus $25,000 for HomeBuilder scheme or $45,000 for first home buyers!* Conditions Apply
-575m2 (approx.) of sought-after vacant land to build your dream home (STCA)
-Level ground, making construction a breeze
-Level allotment makes building and site access a breeze
-18.0m2 frontage and 32.0m2 depth allows for adaptable plans
-Prime location offering a relaxed lifestyle with leisure walks to jetty, school & shops
-Orientation takes full advantage of sunny aspect
-One of the last remaining vacant allotments in this location
-A special project or investment - Investors and serious buyers, be quick!
The Owner Loves.
The opportunity to set yourself up for your dream family home in this location is ideal, it is so close to the shops, schools and beach.

Description:
ONE FOR THE FAMILY OFFERING SPACE AND OUTDOOR ROOM
Modern family home built and completed with an array of modern comforts located on a generous allotment of approx. 512M2. Four generous bedrooms, master with walk in robe and double vanities and oversized shower, all additional bedrooms have BIR's, the central bathroom servicing the three bedrooms. Designer kitchen ,stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances overlooking the large living/dining space with timber flooring and a split system to create comfort with central heating ducted throughout the house. Additional formal living space has WWC and provides a separate space for some quiet time or kids rumpus room. Modern comforts are available with remote double garage, security system, a secondary split system in the master bedroom, large undercover entertaining and lovely landscaped gardens allowing generous space for kids or a large adult gathering. Currently leased until August 2020 to long term tenants. Property available to be lived in so you can enjoy the super convenient location to the supermarket and close access to the local amenities of the Bay and the benefit of all the regions finest wineries.
